# hcup.data

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package provides datasets used by the [Healthcare Cost and Utilization Project (HCUP)](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/tools_software.jsp). 

## Installation

You can install the development version of hcup.data from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("HunterRatliff1/hcup.data")
```

## Data included

Below are the datasets in this package. Use `?<dataset>` for details

```{r data-items, echo=F}
library(hcup.data)
x <- data(package="hcup.data")
df <- data.frame(
  dataset     = x[["results"]][,3],
  description = x[["results"]][,4]
)
knitr::kable(df)
```
